00005 // Smoke effect types
00006 enum
00007 {
00008       NO_SMOKE_EFFECT,

00010       TEARGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT,
00011       MUSTARDGAS_SMOKE_EFFECT,

00015 
00016 #define SMOKE_EFFECT_INDOORS          0x01
00017 #define SMOKE_EFFECT_ON_ROOF          0x02
00018 #define SMOKE_EFFECT_MARK_FOR_UPDATE  0x04
00019 
00020 
00021 typedef struct TAG_SMOKE_EFFECT
00022 {
00023       INT16       sGridNo;          // gridno at which the tear gas cloud is centered
00024 
00025       UINT8       ubDuration;        // the number of turns gas will remain effective
00026       UINT8       ubRadius;          // the current radius of the cloud in map tiles
00027       UINT8   bFlags;            // 0 - outdoors (fast spread), 1 - indoors (slow)
00028       UINT8       bAge;             // the number of turns gas has been around
00029       BOOLEAN     fAllocated;
00030       INT8        bType;
00031       UINT16      usItem;
00032   UINT8   ubOwner;
00033   UINT8   ubPadding;
00034       UINT32      uiTimeOfLastUpdate;
00035 
00036 } SMOKEEFFECT;
